#Proposed new software requirements

= Introduction =
This page holds notes on requirements of the software to drive the two wheeled robot via a Wii Nunchuck.

== Sending Device ==
 * Hardware:
  * 1x - Arduino w/ ATMEGA168
  * 1x ProtoShield v2
  * 1x Xbee transceiver.
  * 1x Wiimote Nunchuck.
 * Software
  * Wiimote Nunchuck interface code
   * Use either Joystick or Accelerometer to control robot.
   * Select Joystick or Accelerometer via "Z" button.
   * "Calibrate" sending device by pressing "C" button.
